post.title: some useful tools for your learning
post.body:
- you need to know how to obtain your homesite, with an address somewhat like mine: 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LBzvbE9uFVY8A68bYJoTpDEC5vS8zsmNo

- you need to let others know where you are, so register it here, it is called seeding your site (conceiving your site, germinating your site, or whatever you think appropriate for this action)
seeding your site -
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LtvsjbtQ2tY7SCtCZzC4KhErqEK3bXD4n

- then go check it on proxies, make sure you see your own homesite:

go to these proxies to check your seeding -
http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeroproxies.bit

- if you see yourself, then that is fine. if not, then say my name.

post.title: my life
post.body:
no matter how you see if the life has its own logic, predefined, predetermined, and predestinied. look around, it says so loudly, everywhere, if you care to note. 

take my address for example, 

1LBzvbE9uFVY8A68bYJoTpDEC5vS8zsmNo

it ends with what? it says something to me, constantly. i did not choose it, it was assigned to me by the system. my name.

post.body:
- humanities

- art, yes art that i love

post.title: about me
post.body:
I was born here in a city that you much heard of but probably never come here before. It is my hometown, but really, think about it now, it is never home. my father was killed in some sort of literarily-named revolution, he died young. my mother remarried but remained unhappy for the rest of her life. here i am now, mostly happy, because i have a happy family, with happy children. yes i am happy now but could never forget the past. yes the past passed but one day i think it could haunt back.

I teach. but do i enjoy it? yes and no. i enjoyed it to the degree of learning myself. but i do not like it because i truly think people can never learn, yes they learn somewhat, but they never change. learning but not changing, that is frustrating when thinking about it. but let it be. it is ok. we should never hope to change others, and they will not change anyway. but if you think about it, why they should change, change into what, and change might not do them good. 

To those good students i say my name. to those midiocres i say welcome. so you know my room is open for some of you, but not all.
